fields.Title of Contribution (if applicable): The Alice Munro Substack Virtual Memorial
fields.Description/Abstract: A gathering of online tributes to Canadian Nobel Laureate in literature Alice Munro, one month to the day after her death, organized and edited by Tara Penry. Link:<br><a href="https://open.substack.com/pub/tarapenry/p/alice-munro-virtual-memorial?r=1mk0zn&utm_campaign=post&utm_medium=web&showWelcomeOnShare=false" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">https://open.substack.com/pub/tarapenry/p/alice-munro-virtual-memorial?r=1mk0zn&utm_campaign=post&utm_medium=web&showWelcomeOnShare=false</a><br>News:<br><a href="https://www.publicnow.com/view/43C8D5225D668CCDE89B4FBDD0D49223DB1327A7?1718747205" target="_blank" rel="noreferrer noopener">https://www.publicnow.com/view/43C8D5225D668CCDE89B4FBDD0D49223DB1327A7?1718747205</a>
fields.Activity Type: Edited, Coordinated, Published an online memorial to the Nobel Laureate 1 month after her death
